duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage cross-functional stakeholders, IT management, IT team members, and external vendor resources to ensure on-time, high-quality, and on-budget delivery of IT projects.
Define project scope and schedule, organize and lead project status meetings, manage risks and issues, and perform delivery planning for assigned projects.
Hold teams accountable, leverage organizational resources, and mentor and develop team members.
Manage customer expectations for project deliverables and stakeholder communications.
Define and champion ongoing process improvement initiatives, promote team empowerment, and ensure sustainable pace and high-quality delivery.
Assist with urgent requests, become fully versed in SG Programs and Products, make recommendations to management, and ensure reporting efficiencies.
Make logical recommendations regarding reporting efficiencies, schedules, prioritization, and resource allocation.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in IT or related field (PMP and/or CSM certification preferred)
